quote: Live your life and forget your age. – Norman Vincent Peale
fact: Larry Lewis ran the 100-yard dash in 17.8 seconds in 1969, thereby setting a new world`s record for runners in the 100-years-or-older class. He was 101.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: What did one plate say to the other plate? Dinner is on me!
